summary: Creates a new fine tuning for the already uploaded files This endpoint is in closed beta. [Contact us](https://groq.com/contact) for more information.

base_model.description: BaseModel is the model that the fine tune was originally trained on.

input_file_id.description: InputFileID is the id of the file that was uploaded via the /files api.

name.description: Name is the given name to a fine tuned model.

type.description: Type is the type of fine tuning format such as "lora".

base_model.description: BaseModel is the model that the fine tune was originally trained on.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp of when the fine tuned model was created.

fine_tuned_model.description: FineTunedModel is the final name of the fine tuned model.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier of a fine tune.

input_file_id.description: InputFileID is the id of the file that was uploaded via the /files api.

name.description: Name is the given name to a fine tuned model.

type.description: Type is the type of fine tuning format such as "lora".
